queries.name: Find all Domain Admins

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n:Group)<-[r:MemberOf*1..]-(m) WHERE n.objectsid =~ {name} RETURN p

queries.name: Find Shortest Paths to Domain Admins

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectsid =~ {name} RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[r:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:{result}})) RETURN p

queries.name: Find Principals with DCSync Rights

queryList.title: Select a Domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

MATCH (n1)-[:MemberOf|GetChanges*1..]->(u:Domain {name: {result}}) WITH n1,u MATCH (n1)-[:MemberOf|GetChangesAll*1..]->(u) WITH n1,u MATCH p = (n1)-[:MemberOf|GetChanges|GetChangesAll*1..]->(u) RETURN p

queries.name: List Computers where DOMAIN USERS are Local Admin

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:AdminTo]->(n:Computer) WHERE m.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Path from DOMAIN USERS to High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (g:Group),(n {highvalue:true}),p=shortestPath((g)-[r*1..]->(n)) WHERE g.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' return p

queries.name: ALL Path from DOMAIN USERS to High Value Targets

queryList.query: MATCH (g:Group) WHERE g.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS'  MATCH (n {highvalue:true}),p=shortestPath((g)-[r*1..]->(n)) return p

queries.name: Find Workstations where DOMAIN USERS can RDP To

queryList.query: match p=(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where g.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' AND NOT c.operatingsystem CONTAINS 'Server' return p

queries.name: Find Servers where DOMAIN USERS can RDP To

queryList.query: match p=(g:Group)-[:CanRDP]->(c:Computer) where g.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' AND c.operatingsystem CONTAINS 'Server' return p

queries.name: Find all other Rights DOMAIN USERS shouldnâ€™t have

queryList.query: MATCH p=(m:Group)-[r:Owns|:WriteDacl|:GenericAll|:WriteOwner|:ExecuteDCOM|:GenericWrite|:AllowedToDelegate|:ForceChangePassword]->(n:Computer) WHERE m.name STARTS WITH 'DOMAIN USERS' RETURN p

queries.name: Users with Foreign Domain Group Membership

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(n:User)-[:MemberOf]->(m:Group) WHERE n.domain={result} AND m.domain<>n.domain RETURN p

queries.name: Groups with Foreign Domain Group Membership

queryList.title: Select source domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=(n:Group {domain:{result}})-[:MemberOf]->(m:Group) WHERE m.domain<>n.domain AND n.name<>m.name RETURN p

queries.name: Map Domain Trusts

queryList.query: MATCH p=(n:Domain)-->(m:Domain) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Unconstrained Delegation Systems

queryList.query: MATCH (n) MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m:Computer {unconstraineddelegation: true})) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths from Kerberoastable Users

queryList.title: Select a domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

queryList.title: Select a user
queryList.query: MATCH (n:User) WHERE n.domain={result} AND n.hasspn=true RETURN n.name, n.pwdlastset ORDER BY n.pwdlastset ASC
MATCH p=shortestPath((a:User {name:{result}})-[:{}*1..]->(b:Computer)) RETURN p

queries.name: Kerberoastable Accounts member of High Value Group

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User)-[r:MemberOf]->(g:Group) WHERE g.highvalue=true AND n.hasspn=true RETURN n, g, r

queries.name: List all Kerberoastable Accounts

queryList.query: MATCH (n:User)WHERE n.hasspn=true RETURN n

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Domain Admins from Kerberoastable Users

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectsid =~ {name} RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((n:User {hasspn:true})-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:{result}})) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Path from Owned Principals

queryList.title: Select a domain...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC

queryList.title: Select a user
queryList.query: MATCH (n) WHERE n.domain={result} AND n.owned=true RETURN n.name, n.PwdLastSet ORDER BY n.PwdLastSet ASC
MATCH p=shortestPath((a {name:{result}})-[:{}*1..]->(b:Computer)) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to Domain Admins from Owned Principals

queryList.title: Select a Domain Admin group...
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Group) WHERE n.objectsid =~ {name} RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((n {owned:true})-[:{}*1..]->(m:Group {name:{result}})) RETURN p

queries.name: Shortest Paths to High Value Targets

queryList.title: Select a Domain
queryList.query: MATCH (n:Domain) RETURN n.name ORDER BY n.name DESC
MATCH p=shortestPath((n)-[:{}*1..]->(m {highvalue:true})) WHERE m.domain={result} AND m<>n RETURN p

queries.name: DA Account Sessions to NON DC

queryList.query: MATCH (c:Computer)-[:MemberOf]->(t:Group) WHERE NOT t.name = 'DOMAIN CONTROLLERS@TESTLAB.LOCAL' WITH c as NonDC MATCH p=(NonDC)-[:HasSession]->(n:User)-[:MemberOf]-> (g:Group {name:'DOMAIN ADMINS@TESTLAB.LOCAL'}) RETURN p
